item.title: Walm Lane junction with Cricklewood Broadway, 27th December
item.description:
A chair has been dumped on the pavement and has been there for some weeks now. Please remove and if possible sweep piles of leaves away to make access to parked cars easier. We use this road to get to our parked car and the bulky item is an eye sore. Many thanks in advance of your help. X
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walm Lane, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Community Park Graffiti, 27th December
item.description:
Both sides of the new community park have graffiti. The wall of 67 and a lot more on the wall of 69. Please clean, as it brings this space down and the general look of the local area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hackney Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement near gate at end of lane running east from Wakefield Street, 27th December
item.description:
There is an uneven paving slab which has been there a long time and is a trip hazard. It is on the pavement a few metres from the end of the lane which runs east from Wakefield Street, adjacent to a street drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wakefield Street, King's Cross, Greater London
